answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
You may want to view the following programs: City of Surprise, AZ, which can be viewed at: http://www.surpriseaz.gov/DocumentView.aspx?DID=4284; also for more exclusive benefits, the City of Ankeny, IA benefits can be viewed here: http://www.ankenyiowa.gov/Index.aspx?page=291.

author: Michael Yeatts
text:
Chesterfield County is exploring the option of converting our traditional annual and sick leave program to a Paid Time Off (PTO) leave program.  If your organization has a PTO leave program please forward you PTO policy to the address below:
yeattsm@chesterfield.gov
Thank you!  Mike Yeatts (804) 768-7406
title: HR Manager
